name: Arco Studio Pro
hero_image_alt: Arco Studio Pro dual-boiler espresso machine in matte black with copper accents, featuring a saturated group head and flow control paddle, positioned on a concrete countertop in a loft-style kitchen, shot mid-pull with tiger-striped espresso flowing, pressure profiling gauge illuminated
headline: Pressure profiling. Flow control. Your rules.
subheadline: A dual-boiler machine with a saturated group head, real-time pressure profiling, and a flow control paddle — for baristas who want to shape every extraction.
description_short: A dual-boiler espresso machine with pressure profiling, flow control, and a saturated group head for complete extraction control.
description_long: The Arco Studio Pro gives you the tools that define the best cafés in the world and puts them on your countertop. The saturated group head maintains temperature within ±0.5°C — tighter than most commercial machines. The flow control paddle lets you manipulate pressure in real time, opening up extraction profiles that were impossible on conventional home machines: long pre-infusions, declining pressure curves, blooming profiles for light roasts. Dual PID-controlled boilers, a digital pressure gauge, and shot-timer integration mean every variable is visible and adjustable. This is the machine you buy when you've decided espresso is a lifelong pursuit.

key_specs.boiler_type: Dual boiler (brass brew, stainless steel steam)
key_specs.pressure_profiling: Manual paddle with digital pressure readout
key_specs.flow_control: Integrated needle valve, real-time flow rate display
key_specs.pressure: Rotary pump, adjustable 0–12 bar via paddle

whats_in_box: IMS competition precision baskets (14 g, 18 g, 21 g)
use_case_headline: Perfect for the barista who wants to shape every shot.
use_case_body: The Studio Pro is for those who see extraction as a creative act. Whether you're profiling a delicate Ethiopian natural or pulling a syrupy medium roast, flow control and pressure profiling let you bring out exactly the character you want.

pairing_products.rationale: Zero-retention single-dosing is essential for the shot-to-shot consistency the Studio Pro demands.
Precision scales with auto-timer and a levelling tamper round out the professional workflow.
Keep the saturated group and boilers in peak condition with a proper maintenance kit.
